feature.name: 19-24 Cell Support  13-18 Cell Support  7-12 Cell Support
feature.summary: The 7-12 Cell Support feature enables the configuration of up to 12

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.pdcchCfiMode
parameters.description: Unlocking of cells can be rejected because of shortage of PUCCH                                 resources. This results in a Resource Configuration Failure                                 alarm.  Required and available PUCCH resources for a cell in FDD depend on                                 the following:    Number of cells per node     Cell bandwidths     The setting of the parameters                                             EUtranCellFDD.pdcchCfiMode,                                             EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchCqiUsers and                                             EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchSrUsers     For more information about dependencies between the parameters, see                                     Control Channel Dimensioning.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchCqiUsers
parameters.description: Unlocking of cells can be rejected because of shortage of PUCCH                                 resources. This results in a Resource Configuration Failure                                 alarm.  Required and available PUCCH resources for a cell in FDD depend on                                 the following:    Number of cells per node     Cell bandwidths     The setting of the parameters                                             EUtranCellFDD.pdcchCfiMode,                                             EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchCqiUsers and                                             EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchSrUsers     For more information about dependencies between the parameters, see                                     Control Channel Dimensioning.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchSrUsers
parameters.description: Unlocking of cells can be rejected because of shortage of PUCCH                                 resources. This results in a Resource Configuration Failure                                 alarm.  Required and available PUCCH resources for a cell in FDD depend on                                 the following:    Number of cells per node     Cell bandwidths     The setting of the parameters                                             EUtranCellFDD.pdcchCfiMode,                                             EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchCqiUsers and                                             EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchSrUsers     For more information about dependencies between the parameters, see                                     Control Channel Dimensioning.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.dlChannelBandwidth
parameters.description: Downlink channel bandwidth in the cell.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.ulChannelBandwidth
parameters.description: Uplink channel bandwidth in the cell.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011356 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011356 MO instance.
